SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO ,B.* ,CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME CZR_REALNAME , B.DXID||'/'||B.PBRQ REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM ( select * from (SELECT B1.ID, B1.DXID, B2.DPRTCODE, to_char(B2.PBRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') PBRQ, B1.REC_CZLS, B1.REC_CZSJ, B1.REC_IP,b1.REC_CZRID,b1.REC_CZSM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B1.REC_CZLS ORDER BY B1.REC_CZSJ DESC) RN FROM B_S_01001_REC B1 INNER JOIN B_S_010_REC B2 ON B1.MAINID = B2.ID AND B1.REC_CZLS = B2.REC_CZLS WHERE B1.DXLX = 10) t where t.rn = 1 ) B LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.DXID = #{paramsMap.DXID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.PBRQ = #{paramsMap.PBRQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from b_s_01001_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT B1.ID, B1.DXID,to_char(b2.pbrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') pbrq, B2.SBSJ, B2.XBSJ, B1.REC_IP, B1.REC_CZSJ, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, TO_CHAR(B2.SBSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')||':00' SBSJSTR, TO_CHAR(B2.XBSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')||':59' XBSJSTR, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION , (CASE WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
(CASE WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_S_01001_REC B1 INNER JOIN B_S_010_REC B2 ON B1.MAINID = B2.ID AND B1.REC_CZLS = B2.REC_CZLS LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B1.REC_CZRID WHERE B1.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B1.REC_XGLX IN (1,2) UNION ALL
SELECT B1.ID, B1.DXID, to_char(b2.pbrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') pbrq, B2.SBSJ, B2.XBSJ, B1.REC_IP, B1.REC_CZSJ , CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, TO_CHAR(B2.SBSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')||':00' SBSJSTR, TO_CHAR(B2.XBSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24')||':59' XBSJSTR, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION , (CASE WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B1.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT , (CASE WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B1.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_S_01001_REC B1 INNER JOIN B_S_010_REC B2 ON B1.MAINID = B2.ID AND B1.REC_CZLS = B2.REC_CZLS LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B1.REC_CZRID WHERE B1.REC_CZLS IN (SELECT REC_CZLS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY m.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, m.REC_CZLS FROM (select * from(SELECT t1.ID, t1.DXID, t2.DPRTCODE, t2.PBRQ, t1.REC_CZLS, t1.REC_CZSJ, t1.REC_IP,t1.REC_CZRID,t1.REC_CZSM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t1.REC_CZLS ORDER BY t1.REC_CZSJ DESC) RN FROM B_S_01001_REC t1 INNER JOIN B_S_010_REC t2 ON t1.MAINID = t2.ID AND t1.REC_CZLS = t2.REC_CZLS WHERE t1.DXLX = 10)n where n.rn = 1) m WHERE m.DXID = #{paramsMap.DXID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.PBRQ = to_date(#{paramsMap.PBRQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (SELECT T.REC_CZSJ FROM B_S_01001_REC T WHERE T.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > m.REC_CZSJ) WHERE 1 = RNO) AND B1.REC_XGLX IN (1,2)
